overview:
He is the founding CEO of Spotzee (startup) company. He currently runs Jonah & Associates, LLC based in Auckland, New Zealand.

He is a self-trained programmer whose passion lies in helping others achieve their goals and aspirations. He has worked on numerous corporate levels from high-end businessmen to recent start-up business owners. His passion is to help others achieve their business goals. He excels in developing relationships, business development and sales.

He currently provide consulting services for business owners needing advice on setting up online businesses and offering their products through online systems. He keeps himself up-to-date with latest web technologies, which helps him achieve client’s expectations with a fraction of the cost in comparison to other consultants.

He believes that while his success to date has given him enormous personal satisfaction, it is his genuine belief in the why, what and whom he aligns himself with.

Roshan specializes in Business Incorporating, Business Advice, Brand Development, Online Marketing, Strategy Development, Communications, Negotiations, Enterprise Systems, Education, Coaching and Mentoring, and Social Media.
